message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
You can have less, I'm the one making the proposal this time!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think we can find a better split.  Let's get closer to an even distribution.
You're getting closer, but I'm not budging much
Okay, Bob.  Let's meet in the middle.  I'll take 40, and you get 60.  This way, we both get something and avoid further inflation.
